name: Forensic Scientist
ability: You start knowing which demon is in play.

name: Ambassador
ability: On your first night, learn 2 characters: Exactly one of them is in play. Once per day, you may challenge a player's public role claim. Tonight, if they were the role they claimed, you die. If not, they die.

name: Woodland Alliance
ability: Each night, learn which players visted an alive player with a sympathy token. If it was no one, choose a player: they receive a sympathy token.

name: Clan Albion
ability: Each night, choose a player to place a flag token. If you are executed, learn how many good players have a flag token that night.

name: Mons Insurance
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: learn their combined token count.

name: Quarantine Specialist
ability: Each night*, choose a player to place a quarantine token on. Evil players who target this player are drunk tonight.

name: Mad Hatter
ability: Each night*, learn the character of the player that was the most mad you were evil yesterday, if possible.

name: Necromancer
ability: Once per game, at night*, discard all tokens you are holding to choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

name: Seer
ability: At night, if you received a duplicate copy of a token, choose a player. Learn their alignment.

name: Dionysus
ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

name: Guard
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player and guess their character: if you are correct, they die immediately.

name: Loyal Servant Of Arthur
ability: On your 1st day, publicly choose a team 5 players. That night, learn if the team contains 2 or more players of evil alignment.

name: Quartermaster
ability: During the day, you may publicly choose a player. If you have three or more tokens and they are evil alignment, they die.

name: Exile
ability: On your first night, receive a quest. If you fulfill your quest, the storyteller will publicly announce a visionary is in the game. If you survive until tomorrow night, you become evil and your team wins.

name: RINNEGATO
ability: The first time you would die from the demon, don't. If you survive until the final 3 players, you may shoot the other 2 players, and win alone. You lose if you die.

name: Jester
ability: You win if executed. When executed, a random townsfolk dies tonight. You lose if you are alive at the end of the game.

name: Happy Salmon
ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

name: Society of Falling Light
ability: Each night, choose a player to place a regret token. They are poisoned until dusk. If they have a night ability: each subsequent night, their action or information is what it would have been the previous night.

name: Bene Gesserit
ability: On your first night, predict on which day a Demon will be executed by a good player's nomination. If you are correct, the execution fails and the evil team wins instead. [+1 Outsider]

name: Magus of Cloaks
ability: At night, if a minion was executed, you may swap characters with them. If the demon is executed and at least 5 players are alive, become the new demon.

name: Lisa
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

name: The Yin Brotherhood
ability: Each night*, choose a player: that player and up to one other player who targeted them dies tonight.

name: Deathwalker
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. When 5 or more players are alive, learn an in-play character. If you kill the learned character, you may kill a second player.

name: Secret Hitler
ability: You think you're a townsfolk, and register as that townsfolk, but aren't. Starting on your 4th day, evil wins if you're executed or no alive player is executed, town wins at night if 3 or less players are alive. Up to 2 players die each night*.

name: Shadows Flicker Like Flame
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The nearest alive good player receives a fear token: their abilities have no effect on you, and you register as good to them if possible. The first player with 2 fear tokens also dies.
